text:
The scale of the #COVID19 pandemic & the need to distribute a #vaccine the moment it’s ready has introduced complexities to the global #supplychain. Professionals Roberto Valdez & Pedro Castillo explain ways #AI & #MachineLearning can help. Learn more: 
https://t.co/r1iDZK3qHs https://t.co/eoWGYmqwP8
